timeline.message: point people to the live registry

timeline.bodyText:
Perhaps: Browse more examples in the registry?
I think “live” and “viewer” aren’t necessary.
timeline.author: pabloest
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -28,7 +28,7 @@ Example patterns: | [`$ELEMENT.innerHTML`](https://semgrep.live/9ze) | ``el.innerHTML = "";`` | | [`$TOKEN.SignedString([]byte("..."))`](https://semgrep.live/rXW) | `ss, err := token.SignedString([]byte("HARDCODED KEY"))` | -→ [see more example patterns in the semgrep-rules repository](https://github.com/returntocorp/semgrep-rules) +→ [see more example patterns in the live registry viewer](https://semgrep.live/registry)
